verses.verse: Then Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> a vial<WH6378> of oil,<WH8081> and poured<WH3332> it on his head,<WH7218> and kissed<WH5401> him, and said,<WH559> Is it not because<WH3588> the LORD<WH3068> has anointed<WH4886> you to be captain<WH5057> over<WH5921> his inheritance?<WH5159>

When you are departed<WH3212> from me to day,<WH3117> then you shall find<WH4672> two<WH8147> men<WH582> by Rachel's<WH7354> sepulcher<WH6900> in the border<WH1366> of Benjamin<WH1144> at Zelzah;<WH6766> and they will say<WH559> to you, The asses<WH860> which<WH834> you went<WH1980> to seek<WH1245> are found:<WH4672> and, see,<WH2009> your father<WH1> has left<WH5203> the care<WH1697> of the asses,<WH860> and sorrows<WH1672> for you, saying,<WH559> What<WH4100> shall I do<WH6213> for my son?<WH1121>

Then shall you go<WH2498> on forward<WH1973> from there,<WH8033> and you shall come<WH935> to the plain<WH436> of Tabor,<WH8396> and there shall meet<WH4672> you three<WH7969> men<WH582> going<WH5927> up to God<WH430> to Bethel,<WH1008> one<WH259> carrying<WH5375> three<WH7969> kids,<WH1423> and another<WH259> carrying<WH5375> three<WH7969> loaves<WH3603> of bread,<WH3899> and another<WH259> carrying<WH5375> a bottle<WH5035> of wine:<WH3196>
And they will salute<WH7965> you, and give<WH5414> you two<WH8147> loaves of bread;<WH3899> which you shall receive<WH3947> of their hands.<WH3027>

After<WH310> that you shall come<WH935> to the hill<WH1389> of God,<WH430> where<WH834> <WH8033> is the garrison<WH5333> of the Philistines:<WH6430> and it shall come<WH1961> to pass, when you are come<WH935> thither<WH8033> to the city,<WH5892> that you shall meet<WH6293> a company<WH2256> of prophets<WH5030> coming<WH3381> down<WH3381> from the high<WH1116> place with a psaltery,<WH5035> and a tabret,<WH8596> and a pipe,<WH2485> and a harp,<WH3658> before<WH6440> them; and they shall prophesy:<WH5012>
And the Spirit<WH7307> of the LORD<WH3068> will come<WH6743> on you, and you shall prophesy<WH5012> with them, and shall be turned<WH2015> into another<WH312> man.<WH376>
And let it be, when<WH3588> these<WH428> signs<WH226> are come<WH935> to you, that you do<WH6213> as occasion<WH4672> serve<WH5647> you; for God<WH430> is with you.

And you shall go<WH3381> down<WH3381> before<WH6440> me to Gilgal;<WH1537> and, behold,<WH2009> I will come<WH3381> down<WH3381> to you, to offer<WH5927> burnt<WH5930> offerings, and to sacrifice<WH2076> sacrifices<WH2077> of peace<WH8002> offerings: seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> shall you tarry,<WH3176> till<WH5704> I come<WH935> to you, and show<WH3045> you what<WH853> <WH834> you shall do.<WH6213>

And it was so, that when he had turned<WH6437> his back<WH7926> to go<WH3212> from Samuel,<WH8050> God<WH430> gave him another<WH312> heart:<WH3820> and all<WH3605> those<WH428> signs<WH226> came<WH935> to pass that day.<WH3117>

And when they came<WH935> thither<WH8033> to the hill,<WH1389> behold,<WH2009> a company<WH2256> of prophets<WH5030> met<WH7125> him; and the Spirit<WH7307> of God<WH430> came<WH6743> on him, and he prophesied<WH5012> among<WH8432> them.

And it came<WH1961> to pass, when all<WH3605> that knew<WH3045> him beforetime<WH865> <WH8032> saw<WH7200> that, behold,<WH2009> he prophesied<WH5012> among<WH5973> the prophets,<WH5030> then the people<WH5971> said<WH559> one<WH376> to another,<WH7453> What<WH4100> is this<WH2088> that is come<WH1961> to the son<WH1121> of Kish?<WH7027> Is Saul<WH7586> also<WH1571> among the prophets?<WH5030>

And one<WH376> of the same place answered<WH6030> and said,<WH559> But who<WH4310> is their father?<WH1> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> it became<WH1961> a proverb,<WH4912> Is Saul<WH7586> also<WH1571> among the prophets?<WH5030>
And when he had made an end<WH3615> of prophesying,<WH5012> he came<WH935> to the high<WH1116> place.

And Saul's<WH7586> uncle<WH1730> said<WH559> to him and to his servant,<WH5288> Where<WH575> went<WH1980> you? And he said,<WH559> To seek<WH1245> the asses:<WH860> and when we saw<WH7200> that they were no<WH369> where,<WH370> we came<WH935> to Samuel.<WH8050>
And Saul's<WH7586> uncle<WH1730> said,<WH559> Tell<WH5046> me, I pray<WH4994> you, what<WH4100> Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to you.

And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> to his uncle,<WH1730> He told<WH5046> us plainly<WH5046> that the asses<WH860> were found.<WH4672> But of the matter<WH1697> of the kingdom,<WH4410> whereof<WH834> Samuel<WH8050> spoke,<WH559> he told<WH5046> him not.
And Samuel<WH8050> called<WH6817> the people<WH5971> together to the LORD<WH3068> to Mizpeh;<WH4709>

And said<WH559> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> I brought<WH5927> up Israel<WH3478> out of Egypt,<WH4714> and delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of the Egyptians,<WH4714> and out of the hand<WH3027> of all<WH3605> kingdoms,<WH4467> and of them that oppressed<WH3905> you:

And you have this day<WH3117> rejected<WH3988> your God,<WH430> who<WH834> himself saved<WH3467> you out of all<WH3605> your adversities<WH7451> and your tribulations;<WH6869> and you have said<WH559> to him, No, but set<WH7760> a king<WH4428> over<WH5921> us. Now<WH6258> therefore present<WH3320> yourselves before<WH6440> the LORD<WH3068> by your tribes,<WH7626> and by your thousands.<WH505>
And when Samuel<WH8050> had caused all<WH3605> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel<WH3478> to come<WH7126> near,<WH7126> the tribe<WH7626> of Benjamin<WH1144> was taken.<WH3920>

When he had caused the tribe<WH7626> of Benjamin<WH1144> to come<WH7126> near<WH7126> by their families,<WH4940> the family<WH4940> of Matri<WH4309> was taken,<WH3920> and Saul<WH7586> the son<WH1121> of Kish<WH7027> was taken:<WH3920> and when they sought<WH1245> him, he could not be found.<WH4672>

Therefore they inquired<WH7592> of the LORD<WH3068> further,<WH5750> if the man<WH376> should yet<WH5750> come<WH935> thither.<WH1988> And the LORD<WH3068> answered,<WH559> Behold <WH2009>he has hid<WH2244> himself<WH1931> among<WH413> the stuff.<WH3627>

And they ran<WH7323> and fetched<WH3947> him there:<WH8033> and when he stood<WH3320> among<WH8432> the people,<WH5971> he was higher<WH1361> than any<WH3605> of the people<WH5971> from his shoulders<WH7926> and upward.<WH4605>

And Samuel<WH8050> said<WH559> to all<WH3605> the people,<WH5971> See<WH7200> you him whom<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> has chosen,<WH977> that there is none<WH369> like<WH3644> him among all<WH3605> the people?<WH5971> And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> shouted,<WH7321> and said,<WH559> God save<WH2421> the king.<WH4428>

Then Samuel<WH8050> told<WH1696> the people<WH5971> the manner<WH4941> of the kingdom,<WH4410> and wrote<WH3789> it in a book,<WH5612> and laid<WH3240> it up before<WH6440> the LORD.<WH3068> And Samuel<WH8050> sent<WH7971> all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> away, every man<WH376> to his house.<WH1004>
And Saul<WH7586> also<WH1571> went<WH1980> home<WH1004> to Gibeah;<WH1390> and there went<WH3212> with him a band<WH2428> of men, whose<WH834> hearts<WH3820> God<WH430> had touched.<WH5060>

But the children<WH1121> of Belial<WH1100> said,<WH559> How<WH4100> shall this<WH2088> man save<WH3467> us? And they despised<WH959> him, and brought<WH935> no<WH3808> presents.<WH4503> But he held<WH2790> his peace.<WH2790>
